function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High degree of physical interaction required for service delivery","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak within the population","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, reduce capacity levels, and enforce social distancing measures","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, appointment scheduling apps, and contact tracing apps","People":"Customers, service providers, and community members","Owner":"Business owners, regulatory authorities, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of defined laws and regulations surrounding the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Confusion and inconsistency in compliance and enforcement, leading to higher risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Regularly update and clarify laws and regulations, provide clear guidelines for businesses and individuals","Technologies":"Public health information systems, communication tools for regulatory authorities","People":"Businesses, regulatory authorities, public health agencies","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Challenges in transitioning services online","Impact":"Disruption of service delivery, potential loss of quality, and increased barriers to accessibility","Mitigation":"Invest in technology infrastructure, provide training for staff and customers, and develop user-friendly online platforms","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, digital learning systems, communication tools for remote collaboration","People":"Service providers, customers, and educational institutions","Owner":"Business owners, educational institutions, technology providers"}]}
